Key Match Events: Bangladesh bowled out Sri Lanka for 235 runs in 50 overs, despite Janith Liyanage hitting an unbeaten century for the visitors
Miscellaneous Highlights: Umpire Richard Kettleborough also did not return to the field after the innings break due to the excessive heat, and was replaced by reserve umpire Tanvir Ahmed
The series is tied 1-1 after Bangladesh won the opener by six wickets, with Sri Lanka taking the second by three wickets on Friday
